Hymn.Arabic: أعلـن الـرب خلاصـه قـدام الأمم. وكشـف عدله لهم.
Hymn.English: 2 The Lord has made known His salvation; His righteousness He has revealed in the sight of the nations.

Hymn.Arabic: ذكر رحمته ليعقـوب. وحقه لبيت إسرائيل. هللويا
Hymn.English: 3 He has remembered His mercy and His faithfulness to the house of Israel. Alleluia
